form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, 157

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS KARACHI FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) 20 JUL 1991 CITY At the request of the American Consul at KARACHI COUNTRY PAKISTAN NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX (Mo., Day, Yr.) MRS. RAHEEM SAB NOOR F M I certify that on the above date I examined 1907 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON C-679069 PAKISTAN MAR 19, 1987 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, Not Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Chronic Alcoholism NON-TOXIC THYROID GOTTER Psychopathic Personality EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS Both hilar region TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT enlarge and dense in appearance No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done -?suggestive Describe findings: of ? hilar 1lymph-adenopathy;" ? Reaction mm Sarcoidosis. Not Done DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DR. MOHAMMED H. KESHAN Consultant Raciologist 17 JUL 1991 DATE READ SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done E. I. A. TEST TYPE: V. D. B. L/ R. P. B. TEST TYPE: DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY Dr. M Khursheed Aga Khan Onl. Aca, 8 JUL 1991 Dr. M Khursheed Age Khan Unf. Aca. 8 JUL 1991 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT (S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS BILATERSE Surger APIAAKIA PROBABLE SARCOIDOSIS APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. 20 JUL 199 Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DR. M. NAEEMUL HAQUI E.R.R.S. (Pb) DABIM FRCP.IC) 7540-00-189-0058 Floor, Al-Wainor. Signature Thank /dr DATE 20 JUL 1991 NSN 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 Garden Road, Karaohi U.S. Government Printing Office: :1989-250-926/00306 REVISED 2-88 DEPT. OF STATE
